thread.title: Ronaldo's heroics help Real claim 2-0 win against Malmo
thread.title_full: Ronaldo's heroics help Real claim 2-0 win against Malmo - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Ronaldo's heroics help Real claim 2-0 win against Malmo
text:
*London, Oct.1 (ANI): Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice to help Real Madrid claim their second consecutive win of the ongoing Champions League season by sweeping aside Malmo at Swedbank Stadion.*
London, Oct.1 (ANI): Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice to help Real Madrid claim their second consecutive win of the ongoing Champions League season by sweeping aside Malmo at Swedbank Stadion. Ronaldo smacked his first goal in the 29th minute to put his side ahead, the Guardian reported. The 30-year-old, who is the top scorer in the Champions League with 82 goals, further extended Real's lead by scoring a goal in the last minute. Real will next lock horns with Paris SG on October 22. Meanwhile, Paris SG also claimed a 3-0 win in their Champions League clash against Shakhtar. (ANI) Â»
